inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) I-II patients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Elective and emergency surgeries requiring general anaesthesia where use of P-LMA™ is not contraindicated
inclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and underwent XRT, which may contraindicate P-LMA use. However, no clear indication of airway abnormality or cervical spine pathology.
